topic.title: Using the with a SharePoint Server

body.p: supports a SharePoint plugin that allows you to open documents from a SharePoint server by specifying the URL of the document. You can also browse the structure of a SharePoint folder by specifying its URL. To access these files, it is assumed that the SharePoint plugin is enabled in your installation of .

You can access files stored in the following types of SharePoint servers:
On premise installation
Office 365 (with or without ADFS authentication)

To open a file stored on a SharePoint server, use the dedicated SharePoint Open Document button in the Open file section of the main dashboard. If your connection has not yet been configured, a SharePoint Login dialog box will be displayed that allows you to specify the authentication credentials for the server.
